title: How To Put On Zagg Invisible Shield Smudge-Proof Screen Protector For iPad Air
description:
How to Put On Zagg Smudge-Proof Screen Protector for iPads.

What you will need:
-painters tape
-microfiber cleaning cloth
-clean surface
-screen cleaning solution
-squeegee provided by Zagg


In just a few simple steps you can put on the Zagg Screen Protector on your iPad Air. 
You will want to make sure that the iPad screen has no smudges. 
Use the microfiber cleaning cloth to get rid of any stains/smudges. 
Using the painters tape take a large piece and remove all excess lint and dirt off the screen. (The painters tape had low adhesive and will not damage the iPad screen)
Spray the screen of device with solution until completely covered.
Next you will want to peel the protector off the paper it comes on.
 Spray the sticky side generously with solution. The reason for this is when you lay it down it will be easy to adjust. 
After laying it down spray the top of the protector. 
Squeege the top half first followed by the rest.  the spray will not damage the screen. 
Wipe down with the microfiber cloth and let it dry for 12-14 hours. 




Buy Zagg Smudge-Proof iPad Air Screen Protector ID5SWSF00 - http://www.abt.com/product/75419/Zagg-ID5SWSF00.html

Features:
• Self-healing
• Military-Grade Scratch Protection
• Thin tough & easy to install
• Reduces appearance of smudges and fingerprints
• Improves screen visibility under bright conditions
